Package com.goinstant.auth

Tools for Authenticating your Users with GoInstant.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
Group Groups are used by GoInstant to enforce ACLs.
User Defines properties of a User in GoInstant.
 

Class Summary
PlainGroup A Plain Group implementation.
PlainUser A Plain User implementation.
Signer Generates JWT Tokens for your Users.
 

Package com.goinstant.auth Description

Tools for Authenticating your Users with GoInstant. Please read GoInstant guide on Security and Auth. See the main GoInstant website for what GoInstant is.
A User belongs to zero or more Groups. These are both declared as Interfaces so that you can tack them on easily to your existing code via adapters. For concrete implementations, use instead PlainUser and PlainGroup.
The Signer class is where the action happens. You constrct it with your GoInstant secret key, pass in a User, and BOOM, out pops a token, ready for passing into the GoInstant client!
